testcase.classname: Login to Amazon homepage and select the product
testcase.name: Navigating to Amazon homepage
testcase.system-out: Given User has opened the browser...........................................passed When browser is open........................................................passed Then Enter url Amazon and go................................................passed Then Hover over the Account Tab.............................................passed Then click on SignIn........................................................passed Then enter username and password and login..................................passed Then Hover on Shop by department tab........................................passed Then Move curser to headphones under Electronics,computer & office..........passed Then click on headphones link...............................................passed Then type philips on search tab on Headphones and Earphones page............passed Then click on philips lighweight in-ear SHE.................................passed Then System should navigate to this product page............................passed
